name: Death end re;Quest Early Bird Special / ボーナスコンテンツ開放/ 獎勵內容提前體驗
detailed_description:
You know what they say... the early bird gets the goose. I think that's how it goes.
The Early Bird Special DLC unlocks BONUS mode, which allows you to view all your favorite CGs and images unlocked in the story!
about_the_game:
You know what they say... the early bird gets the goose. I think that's how it goes.
The Early Bird Special DLC unlocks BONUS mode, which allows you to view all your favorite CGs and images unlocked in the story!
short_description: The Early Bird Special DLC unlocks BONUS mode, which allows players to view a gallery of your favorite moments in Death end re;Quest!

fullgame.name: Death end re;Quest / デス エンド リクエスト / 死亡終局 輪廻試練

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1 GB or better graphics card that can support DirectX 12.0 or more
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires SSE4.2 compatible PC
